title: Walmart, Capital One settle lawsuit over credit card partnership
text: Walmart settled its lawsuit against Capital One over their credit card partnership, which had made Capital One the exclusive issuer of Walmart-branded consumer credit cards before ending last month.

title: Report: Walmart and Capital One Settle Legal Battle
text: Walmart and Capital One have reportedly settled a lawsuit centering on their former credit card partnership. The case was dismissed Thursday (June 20) by a judge after the companies resolved their claims and counterclaims, Reuters reported Friday (June 21).
